column4: hey can please somebody help me in adding the french language to openoffice, i mean how to for example set the language for a document and have writing aids in french, and also how can i add a french dictionary server to the dictionary aplication already included in ubuntu ?
surely the openoffice website help will be more help for you than us
and you know the default dictionary in ubuntu right ( Applications-accessories-Dictionary ) how can i add french to it ? cuz i can't chooose french as the dictionary in the preferences
well there's a key in gconf-editor under GNOME/Spell, but other than that - no idea
